Positions Open for Scientists and Engineers
(The 1st Korean Brain Pool Program in 2006)

The Korean Federation of Science and Technology Societies (KOFST) invites the outstanding scientists and engineers from overseas to work in various research institutes in Korea.

Fields; All fields of Science and Technology

Number of Open; Approximately 00

Requirements;
- Doctoral degree holder; more than 5 years overseas experiences in R&D post-doctoral; All nationalities are invited.
- Regardless of his/her degree, outstanding overseas Korean or foreign scientists/engineers who have proven achievements
and in-depth experiences for more than 5 years in his/her field(s).

Invitation Period; - From 3 moths to 2 years
- Invitation period may be extended.

Financial Support; Visiting expenses are paid on monthly basis, in addition Living expenses, round trip airplane tickets and moving expenses will be reimbursed at the beginning of the term.

Tasks;
- Joint R&D projects as requested by the host organizations in Korea.
- Joint R&D projects with new or existing research/development teams.
- Special lectures, seminars, conferences. Etc.

Host Organizations; - Government Financed Research Center (Institution)
- National/Public Research Center (Institution)
- University or University Research Center
- Non-Profit Corporation Research Center
- Industrial Research Center

Application Period; By 16th December, 2005

How to apply; Apply for On-line Brain Pool Homepage (http://www.brainpool.or.kr/)
